pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Noto Color Emoji 2.x is the rounder Oreo styled Emoji 12.0 ready set.
Noto Color Emoji 1.3x is the chubby Jelly Bean styled emoji which supported some Emoji 4.0 and skin tones.
Noto Color Emoji 1.2x is the skinny Jelly Bean styled emoji which supported some Emoji 4.0 with ZWJ used with multiple emojis to represent one emoji.
This package is used to build the font from sources.

use.flag: Compresses emoji images with zoptlipng. Better compression results at around 5-10% compared to zlib deflate but slower. (default)
